item.title: Project 1: Spain Electricity Shortfall Challenge
item.description: This Project’s GitHub Repository In this project, my team (consisting of 5 individuals) was tasked to model the shortfall between the energy generated by means of fossil fuels and various renewable sources - for the country of Spain. The team decided that I take on the position of Project Manager. The load_shortfall_3h (3-Hour Daily Shortfall) was modelled as a function of various city-specific weather features such as pressure, wind speed, humidity, etc.
